income_messages:
From: m****************2@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-09 07:14:38
SUBJECT: Hello Beloved,
Hello Beloved,
My name is Katherine Patrick and I was born in  Louisana not far from
Houston Texas but married to my husband Robert Patrick  from United
Kingdom who working and living in Usa as of then, but we finally move
down to United Kingdom my husband's home town in Wales the Northern
part . I wrote you this letter because I need your assistance.
. I grew up in an orphanage and was married to my late husband for 26
years without a child and my husband died as a result of road accident
in 2018. I am 68years I am currently suffering from liver cancer and
my health is deteriorating speedily. Just yesterday, the specialist
handling my case told me that I have a few days to live on earth and I
became so worried because of the sad news he gave me.
Now, I want my inheritance funds to be used for charity works. My
instinct leads me to write this letter to you and seek your assistance
to handle this task in the way I will instruct you and maybe God will
consider me worthy his presence when I die.
If you accept to handle the task, I shall will my inheritance funds
($20M USD) to you to start the charity work and I shall leave you with
instructions on how to manage the funds.
I wait to hearing from you through this email:
mrsjulianapatrick2@gmail.com
 as soon as possible.
Regards,
Katherine Patrick
From: m****************2@gmail.com
To: ql23563@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-12 09:41:50
SUBJECT: Re: Hello Beloved,
Please contact my lawyer
outbound_messages:
From: ql23563@l******s.email
To: m****************2@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-09 07:14:42
SUBJECT: Re: Hello Beloved,
Dear Katherine,
I am sorry to hear about your health condition and the loss of your husband. It is very kind of you to think of using your funds for charity works. I would be honored to assist you in this task and ensure that your wishes are carried out. Please let me know the details of how you would like the funds to be used and I will do my best to make it happen.
Best wishes,
Sue
From: ql23563@l******s.email
To: m****************2@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-12 10:12:23
SUBJECT: Re: Hello Beloved,
Dear Sir/Madam,
Thank you for your message. I would like to request that all further communication regarding this matter be directed to my lawyer. Please provide me with your contact information so that I may forward it to my legal representative.
Thank you for your understanding.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Sue
